text:
Even though DNS is case insensitive and apache does case insensitive when 
matching host names to virtual servers Tomcat seems to do case sensitive 
matching of the names it finds in the Host directive in server.xml. For example

<Host name="hexten.net">
    <Context path="" docBase="/usr/whatever/hexten.net/htdocs" />
</Host>

won't match the (valid) URL

  http://HEXTEN.NET/
creator: andy@tagish.com

text: Fixed in 3.3 ( next nightly ), thanks for the report
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
